{{ja-kanjitab|沈|魚|落|雁}}

===Etymology===
* From [[w:Middle Chinese|Middle Chinese]]: [[沉魚落雁]]

===Idiom===
'''沈魚落雁''' (ちんぎょらくがん, chin gyo raku gan)

# {{lb|ja|idiomatic}} [[beauty|Beauty]] [[truly]] can be [[stunning]]. ''Lit.'' Such was her beauty that, in a fluster, fish sank to the bottom of the sea and geese dropped from the sky.

====Synonyms====
* {{l|ja|羞花閉月}}
